title: Kronos post-processing configuration file format
description: The post-processing configuration file format controls the post-processing of Kronos runs

experiment_list.description: Tags of simulation list (used to label plots and/or tabular data)

experiment_paths.description: Paths of simulations (path containing the job-<jobID> sub-folders. They corresponds to the experiment_list tags)

output_path.description: Path where the output will be exported into

n_procs_node.description: N procs per node used to run the cases (TODO: this info needs to be removed..)

job_classes.description: List of classes that jobs will be grouped into for the post-processing

exports.description: List of exports to do with the data collected from the set of simulations

oneOf.description: Export plots/tables of overall rates on all the simulations

format.description: Specific format which tabulated/plotted data will be written into

tag.description: A distinctive tag for this export (it is appended to the export output filename)

y_lims.description: Y-limits of the axis specified by user (for plotting only)

format.description: Specific format which tabulated/plotted data will be written into

tag.description: A distinctive tag for this export (it is appended to the export output filename)

signals.description: Options for signals (each line is for a specific metric)

(x_lims|y_lims).description: x_lims and y_lims (only valid for plotting)
